Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to establishing a pilot program for the use of body-worn cameras on certain correction officers
Summary: Relates to establishing a pilot program for the use of body-worn cameras on certain correction officers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to establishing a pilot program for the use of body-worn cameras on certain correction officers
